subSubSection.paragraph:
Lectotype : Brazil , São Paulo : São Paulo (Bosque da Saúde), 23. I.1916 , J. Melzer. The specimen is herein designated as the lectotype in order to stabilize the taxonomy and facilitate further identification of this species. Junior synonym of
Ischiocentra hebes (Thomson, 1868)

Santa Catarina
: Rio Vermelho ,

subSubSection.paragraph:
